findings.message:
EarnERC777._defaultOperatorsArray (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#630) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- EarnERC777.defaultOperators() (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#791-793)
findings.name: uninitialized-state

findings.message:
EarnERC777._distributeRevenue(address) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#1086-1100) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_exchangeRate = _exchangeRate.mul(_totalSupply.mul(RATE_SCALE).div(_totalSupply.sub(value))).div(RATE_SCALE) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#1094)
findings.name: divide-before-multiply

	- _callTokensToSend(spender,holder,recipient,amount,,) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#862)
		- IERC777Sender(implementer).tokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#1052)

	- _approve(holder,spender,_allowances[holder][spender].sub(amount)) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#866)
		- _allowances[holder][spender] = value (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#1027)
	- _move(spender,holder,recipient,amount,,) (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#864)
		- _balances[account] = balance (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#930)
		- _balances[account] = balance (../..0x3212b29e33587a00fb1c83346f5dbfa69a458923.sol#938)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign
